title: tyAgarAjE krtyAkrtyam
sahitya:
tyAgarAjE krtyAkrtyam arpayAmi vidEha kaivalyam yAmi


anupallavi

 bhOga yOgAtmakE bhukti muktyAtmakE tyAga rAgAtmakE tatvam parAtmakE


caraNam   parkrti puruSAtmakE pancabhUtAtmakE prakrti vikrtAtmakE pancIkrtAtmakE 
sukrti hrdayAtmakE sUrya candrAtmakE vikrti bhEdAtmakE vishvEshvarAtmakE 
sukrti pUrNAtmakE sura guruguhAtmakE
